biotools.summary: Produces high resolution, publication ready linkage maps and quantitative trait loci maps. Input can be output from 'R/qtl', simple text or comma delimited files. Output is currently a portable document file.

bioschemas.name: LinkageMapView
bioschemas.summary: Produces high resolution, publication ready linkage maps and quantitative trait loci maps. Input can be output from 'R/qtl', simple text or comma delimited files. Output is currently a portable document file.
